 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַק‎</span>] **verb** ==tear apart, away== (Late Hebrew ***remove*** (load, etc.), Pi\`el ***separate, take to pieces***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***split, divide***;; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרַק‎</span> especially ***redeem, rescue***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***withdraw*** (intransitive), also ***remove, rescue***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: ***set free***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפָרַקְדָמתּ֫‎</span> [[Gen.27.40|Gen 27:40]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְרְקֵנזּ‎</span> [[Ps.136.24|Ps 136:24]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּרֵק‎</span> [[Lam.5.8|Lam 5:8]]; [[Ps.7.3|Ps 7:3]] ***tear away*** yoke from pff (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> neck [[Gen.27.40|Gen 27:40]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); ***snatck*** from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) foes, = ***rescue*** (Aramaic) [[Lam.5.8|Lam 5:8]]; [[Ps.136.24|Ps 136:24]] so absolute [[Ps.7.3|Ps 7:3]] (prefixing <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(וְ)אֵין‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#We|We]]), &gt; [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others ***snatch away*** as prey. **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְפָרֵק‎</span> [[Zech.11.16|Zech 11:16]] ***he shall tear off*** their hoofs; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּֽרְקוּ‎</span> [[Exod.32.2|Exod 32:2]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***tear off*** the golden ear-tings; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפָרֵק‎</span> [[1Kgs.19.11|1Kgs 19:11]] a great wind ***rending*** mountains (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁבֵּר‎</span>). **Hithpa\`el** ***tear off*** (for, i.e. from, oneself [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:54f»§ 54f</sup>); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְפָּֽרְקוּ‎</span> [[Exod.32.3|Exod 32:3]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתנִֿזְמֵי הַזָּהָב‎</span>; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְפָּרָ֑קוּ‎</span> v[[Exod.32.24|Exod 32:24]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; object omitted); passive ***be broken off, Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְפָּֽרְקוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.19.12|Ezek 19:12]] (branches).
